content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to create a speed converter with HTML and JavaScript. Speed Converter Type a value in any of the fields to convert between speed measurements: MPH KPH Knots Mach Create a Speed Converter Create an input element that can convert a value from one speed measurement to another. Step 1) Add HTML: Example - MPH to KPH

KPH:

Step 2) Add JavaScript: Example - MPH to KPH /* When the input field receives input, convert the value from mph to kph */ function speedConverter(valNum) { valNum = parseFloat(valNum); document.getElementById("outputKPH").innerHTML = valNum * 1.609344; } Convert from MPH to other Measurements The table below shows how to convert from MPH to other speed measurements: Description Formula Example Convert from MPH to KPH KPH=MPH*1.609344 Try it Convert from MPH to Knots knots=MPH/1.150779 Try it Convert from MPH to Mach Mach=MPH/761.207 Try it Convert from KPH to other Measurements The table below shows how to convert from KPH to other speed measurements: Description Formula Example Convert from KPH to MPH MPH=KPH/1.609344 Try it Convert from KPH to Knots knots=KPH/1.852 Try it Convert from KPH to Mach Mach=KPH/1225.044 Try it Convert from Knots to other Measurements The table below shows how to convert from Knots to other speed measurements: Description Formula Example Convert from Knots to MPH MPH=knots*1.150779 Try it Convert from Knots to KPH KPH=knots*1.852 Try it Convert from Knots to Mach Mach=knots/661.4708 Try it Convert from Mach to other Measurements The table below shows how to convert from Mach to other speed measurements: Description Formula Example Convert from Mach to MPH MPH=Mach*761.207 Try it Convert from Mach to KPH KPH=Mach*1225.044 Try it Convert from Mach to Knots knots=Mach*661.4708 Try it ★ +1
